start: Oh, this is precious. First Dr. Derp and now a Superhero?
NEVER FEAR, CAPTAIN CRIMEBUSTER IS HERE!
Yeah, yeah we heard you the first three times.
Ugh, Rent-a-Heroes. Lowest of the low.
Hey, don’t you badmouth the League of Bargain Heroes.
I’ll bet he has some cool abilities you could use.
Like X-Ray vision or laser sight?
Did you see that guy’s polyester costume? Let’s have lower expectations.
